channel.title: The Check In
channel.description: The Check In is a weekly podcast in which two friends keep discuss their attempts to bootstrap side businesses while both working full time and having a family. It's a different kind of start up podcast, made for anyone who wants a their own business, but isn't interested in having investors.
channel.itunes:author: Joe Fiorini & Alan Audette
channel.itunes:subtitle: The Check In is a different kind of startup podcast, where you can listen to two beginners getting started with their own startups.
channel.itunes:summary: The Check In is a weekly podcast in which two friends keep discuss their attempts to bootstrap side businesses while both working full time and having a family. It's a different kind of start up podcast, made for anyone who wants a their own business, but isn't interested in having investors.

item.title: Week 5
item.description: More updates on our side businesses: Alan is about ready to release his iPhone apps. We also discuss marketing copy and understanding your users. This episode also features a cameo from Joey Beninghove to talk about his podcast CoderTalk. If you want to hear us talk geek check out the latest episode of CoderTalk.
